text: Bogdan Romuald Tuszyński (4 July 1932 - 1 January 2017) was a Polish sports journalist, reporter and historian. He was best known for his sports report Studio S-13 of the Polskie Radio, beginning in 1970. He started his job as an editor of Przegląd Sportowy (1951-1952). He later moved to Polskie Radio in 1953, leaving them in 1981. He also reported on the Peace Race every year. He published about thirty books between 1975 and 2009. Tuszyński was born in Łódź. His daughter, Agata Tuszyńska (born 1957), also became a journalist. Tuszyński died after a long illness on 1 January 2017 in Warsaw.
